name: reCAPTCHA (KoriusDM)
description:
Cybernetics - How far should you go?

In this platformer adventure you go through the question: "how much can you replace in the human body until you become a robot".

This game was made for Universe Game Jam 02 by:

Story: Zofia Einhorn, MarianaAit

Game Design: Zofia Einhorn, MarianaAit, KoriusDM

Visual Design: Pailin

Engineering: Matan Maron, AlonWolf123, KoriusDM

Animations: Pailin, KoriusDM

Audio: Nir Jacob Younessi

This was the first game jam for most of us :)

Git repo
